name: fetch-data-lambda
description: Lambda function for daily cryptocurrency data fetch

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/node_modules/@prisma/client dist/node_modules/.prisma/client && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --outfile=dist/index.js --external:@aws-sdk/* --external:@prisma/client --external:aws-lambda --minify && cp -r node_modules/.prisma/client dist/node_modules/.prisma/ && cp node_modules/@prisma/client/*.js dist/node_modules/@prisma/client/ && cp node_modules/@prisma/client/*.d.ts dist/node_modules/@prisma/client/ && cp -r node_modules/@prisma/client/runtime dist/node_modules/@prisma/client/ && cp node_modules/@prisma/client/package.json dist/node_modules/@prisma/client/ && find dist/node_modules/.prisma/client \( -name 'libquery_engine-darwin*' -o -name '*.wasm' -o -name '*browser*' -o -name 'edge.*' -o -name 'wasm*' \) -type f -delete
